settings.name: ClaimSele
settings.select: A.ID, dbo.f_Getcodename('审核状态',A.F_Status) F_StatusName ,dbo.f_Getcodename('是否',A.F_IsPrint) IsPrintName ,A.F_ClaimCode,A.B_ChassisCode,B.ModelName,C.CustomerName ,A.F_InputTime,A.F_AuditName,A.F_AuditTime,A.F_AuditRemark ,A.F_partMoney,A.F_hourMoney,A.F_outMoney,A.F_otherMoney,A.F_Total
settings.from: [dbo].[F_C_Claim] A left join B_AutoArchives B on A.B_ChassisCode=B.VIN left join B_Customer C on C.VIN=A.B_ChassisCode

settings.name: grid2
settings.select: ManHourCode, ManHourDescribe, ManHour,DispatchManHour, AddonsManHour, ManHour+DispatchManHour+AddonsManHour as F_Total

settings.name: grid3
settings.select: AssemCode as F_IngredientCode,AssemName as F_IngredientName,InPrice as F_InPrice

settings.name: grid5
settings.select: dbo.f_Getcodename('审核状态',A.F_Status) F_StatusName,A.B_B_CarRunMile,A.F_ClaimCode,A.F_AuditName, A.F_AuditRemark,A.B_CorpTel,A.B_LicensePlate,A.B_ChassisCode ,B.EngineCode,B.ModelName,A.F_RepailName,A.F_RepailTel ,(select SUM(F_Total) from F_ClaimPartList where F_ClaimCode=A.F_ClaimCode) as F_Total ,CONVERT(money,ISNULL(E.ManHour,0.00)) as F_hourMoney ,CONVERT(money,ISNULL(E.DispatchManHour,0.00)) as F_outMoney ,CONVERT(money,ISNULL(E.AddonsManHour,0.00)) as F_otherMoney ,A.F_InputTime
settings.from: F_C_Claim A left join B_AutoArchives B ON A.B_ChassisCode=B.VIN left join S_ManHour E on B.ModelID=E.ModelID and B.BrandID=E.BrandID
